title: A Utah city violated the First Amendment in denying a drag show permit, judge rules
description: Utah city must issue a permit for a group that organizes drag performances.

title: Detainee dies at New Mexico hospital after 'escape attempt,' authorities say
description: An official said there were altercations and an escape attempt at a county jail.

title: 3 men charged after allegedly vandalizing homes of New Hampshire journalists
description: The men also allegedly vandalized the homes of one of the reporter's parents on two occasions, the U.S. attorney's office said.

title: Woman who revived during her wake is dead after a week in intensive care
description: A 76-year-old woman who had been declared dead and surprised her relatives by knocking on her coffin during her wake earlier this month has died after seven days in intensive care

title: Putin meets with African leaders in Russia to discuss Ukraine peace plan, but no visible progress
description: A group of African leaders traveled to Russia on a self-styled "peace mission."

title: Arkansas city honors enslaved man who fled to Canada and was later extradited
description: An enslaved man fled Arkansas in 1841 seeking freedom in Canada.

title: Stones frontman Jagger, girlfriend have Florida house up for sale
description: The lakefront home with four bedrooms and 5.5 baths is listed at $3.499 million.

title: WNBA working with Brittney Griner and Mercury on travel options including charter flights
description: Griner was harassed at an airport by what the WNBA called a "provocateur."

title: Michigan man charged with threatening synagogue massacre
description: Threat was on the fifth anniversary of the massacre at two New Zealand mosques.

title: Highway safety agency reports power problems in 2022 Hyundai Ioniq 5 SUVs
description: U.S. regulators say multiple U.S. owners of the electric SUV have complained.

title: More than dozen people injured in crash involving bus, 2 vehicles: Police
description: More than a dozen people were injured in a crash involving a public bus and two vehicles in Baltimore Saturday morning, police said.

title: 5 killed in crash after they were hit by a driver who was evading police
description: Authorities say five people were killed when a driver ran a red light while fleeing Minneapolis police

title: Trump compares his Espionage Act case to Clinton. Winner's may be more apt: ANALYSIS
description: Reality Winner's case may be more instructive on the stakes Trump faces.

title: Sudan officials say airstrike kills 17, including 5 children
description: Sudanese health officials say an airstrike in Sudan’s capital Khartoum has killed at least 17 people, including five children as fighting continued between rival generals seeking to control the country

title: Kourtney Kardashian announces she is pregnant with Travis Barker at Blink-182 concert
description: Kourtney Kardashian has announced that she and Blink-182 drummer, Travis Barker, are pregnant with their first child.

title: At least 25 killed in rebel attack on Ugandan school near Congo border
description: Ugandan police say at least 25 people have been killed in a suspected rebel attack on a school near the Congo border

title: Patriots player Jack Jones arrested at Boston airport after guns found in luggage, police say
description: Police say a New England Patriots player was arrested at a security checkpoint at Boston’s Logan Airport after two guns were found in a carry-on bag

title: Teen arrested after FBI uncovers alleged mass shooting plot
description: A 19-year-old man who allegedly professed neo-Nazi ideologies online was arrested after federal investigators allege he planned a mass shooting.

title: Fatal tour boat accident prompts New York governor to propose new oversight
description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul says she wants the state to have regulatory authority over boats that operate in caves and similar waterways following a fatal tour boat accident this week

title: Men charged with vandalizing homes of New Hampshire journalists
description: Three men face federal charges alleging they vandalized multiple homes associated with New Hampshire journalists in retaliation for a report detailing sexual misconduct allegations against a prominent businessman

title: Severe storm kills 3 in southern Brazil, 12 still missing
description: Authorities in the southern Brazil state of Rio Grande do Sul say three people are dead and 12 are missing after a severe winter storm swept through the region
